headerDisplay: Cron Scheduler plugin for Homebridge, which allows scheduling of triggers using cron expressions.
footerDisplay: Visit the Project [Readme](https://github.com/uamanager/homebridge-cron-scheduler#readme) for more details.

timezone.title: Global Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone in 'Europe/Kiev' format to use for all tasks. Leave blank for using the system timezone.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Add one or more tasks below.

taskActive.title: Active
taskActive.description: Defines whether the task is active or not.

taskName.title: Task Name
taskName.description: A unique name for the task. Will be used as the accessory name.

taskCronExpression.title: Cron Expression
taskCronExpression.description: The cron expression to use for the task. Check [Readme](https://github.com/uamanager/homebridge-cron-scheduler#readme) for more details.

taskMaxRuns.title: Task Max Runs
taskMaxRuns.description: Maximum number of times the task can run. Leave blank for unlimited.

taskStateResetInterval.title: Task State Reset Interval
taskStateResetInterval.description: The interval in minutes after which the task state will be reset. Leave '0' for immediate reset, change to '-1' for enabling toggle mode.

taskStartAt.title: Task Start At
taskStartAt.description: Time at which the task should start. Leave blank for immediate start. ISO 8601 formatted datetime (2021-10-17T23:43:00) in local time.

taskStopAt.title: Task Stop At
taskStopAt.description: Time at which the task should stop. Leave blank for no stop. ISO 8601 formatted datetime (2021-10-17T23:43:00) in local time.

timezone.title: Task Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone override in 'Europe/Kiev' format to use for this tasks. Leave blank for using the global timezone.
